tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  HILARIOUS
comments: He\'s very helpful and kind! He makes a bunch of bad jokes but they\'re bearable because he is just a great professor. Most of the reading is online so you don\'t have to worry about buying books.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Class was interesting, and he is a very caring professor.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Mr Golden is an amazing teacher. As an SGI (the cult which founded Soka university) leading member, he expanded his teaching to Humanities. SGI students can thereby take multiple courses with him. Good listener, aware of his responsibilities, he expects students to transcend their teachers. Highly recommended to foreign and Japanese students.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: His class was very interesting and he\'s an engaging lecturer, but you have to work very hard to earn your grade.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Humorous in class, but expects students to put effort into their assignments. Keeping up with the reading is essential to get the most out of his class discussion. He is very approachable outside of class and is always available in his office. He willingly gives advice in matters outside of his academic class!

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He is a teacher and a professional jazz pianist. His view of music is really insightful. Also, he is familiar with humanity.
